title: 硬件撚討論硬件知識、砌機list、解答問題集中帖(61)

replies.msg:
新人求List需知

為方便連登眾巴絲可以好好幫助你，請你好好合作
不但可以令連登眾巴絲可以盡快回覆你的問題，更可以令條List更適合你所需

關於所有店舖事項請巴打從其他有效方式聯絡

顯卡係蝗語，請講顯示卡或display card


1. Budget
NO MONEY NO TALK ，預算上限寬鬆可以買好一點，預算太低可能要將就或繼續儲錢

2. 電腦主要用途
你想玩咩遊戲? (多數砌機都會打機，如果唔係請另外講明)
最好講game名，唔好一句steam game/blizzard/EA game就算
因為成千上萬隻人地唔知你玩邊隻
需唔需要直播或錄製遊戲影片?

3. 個人需求
玩以上遊戲你最低可接受嘅畫質(Ultra/高/中/低)?最低可接受幾fps?
如果你預計會玩新遊戲，想幾耐唔駛升級電腦硬件?
想唔想超頻?散熱需求如何?使唔使靜過Dyson?
有冇特定嘅牌子信仰?想唔想有華麗嘅RGB光效?

4. 現在或將會使用mon的類型
解像度有分1080p, 2K(1440p), 4K(2160p)
更新頻率有分60Hz, 144Hz, 240Hz
你想要咩解像度(畫質)同更新頻率(流暢度)?
解像度高，會對打機效能造成影響，但畫質會更好
更新頻率高，如效能足夠可以造成比低更新頻率更好嘅流暢度

5. 自己都學習一些
講真，有一班巴絲好憎伸手黨，所以建議你行多一兩步
哪怕你直接照抄悠二巴打List放上黎問，佢地都會出手幫助
只是Ctrl-C和Ctrl-V咁簡單，大家都會開心嘅事點解唔做呢?
甚至可能你在過程中已經搵到需要的答案都不一定!
(悠二List網站 : http://yujihw.com)

好快又負評架啦

btw
如果粒1700唔係超級差體質
stock cooler唔係可以輕鬆壓住3.7咩

1.25V上3.7得唔得？

得

得係長期用都唔縮？

唔知

之前一路都係1.275v（3.72ghz），
用咗半年都冇事。

咁我都係換左cooler再1.3上3.7
Strong hold 3.6

咁驚，落返3.5la


要落就落3.0
原裝風扇壓到3.7，其實最主要睇電壓 越大就越熱，通常搵到個最低電壓推粒u 過埋測試 我都會加多一兩格電

In the here and now, Ryzen remains a capable gaming performer, but the fact it's so good at some workloads while falling short in others is a puzzle wrapped in an enigma, and the disparity has yet to be explained - and we did ask. AMD released a couple of statements from Oxide Games (Ashes of the Singularity) and Creative Assembly (Total War) telling us to expect optimisation pushes for Ryzen to get more performance from the new architecture. Obviously this is welcome, but PC owners go into an upgrade expecting a big out-of-the-box improvement, not 'jam tomorrow'. Back catalogue titles likely won't receive this attention, while the immediate future for platform-specific optimisations is uncertain. Longer term, we can pretty sure that Ryzen optimisation will gain traction - we're confident that the architecture will appear in the next console generation.

Originally Posted by AlphaC 出自原post

Right now it's looking like for VRM (subject to change if some boards are using 2 low side mosfets aka "doubled low side"):
TOP (LN2 , monoblocks)= Gigabyte Z370 SOC Force (unreleased, found on hwbot records) , Gigabyte Z370 Gaming 7 due to iSL99227B (60A rating) ... top audio, overkill VRM , Asus ROG APEX (a record holder on LN2) using 50A Optimos, MSI Z370 Godlike (using 60A IR3555 overkill VRM poor price/perf regardless)... likely Asus Z370 Maximus X Extreme too

Upper tier (custom water) = Asrock Z370 Fatal1ty Gaming Pro i7 (whatever the full name is, the expensive one) , Asrock Z370 Taichi using Fairchild Dual-N (low+high side) when heatsinked properly with heatpipe (limited to about 35A per mosfet @ 100°C), Asus Formula/Code/Hero boards using 50A Optimos

Midrange <$200 (All-in-one watercooling/dual tower air cooling)= Asrock Z370 Extreme4 / K6 using Sinopower 2-in-1 / "DSM"/ low+high side
Low Midrange , should be $160ish or less (Asus z270-A level VRM)=Asus Z370-A , Asus Z370E/F /G , Gigabyte Z370 Gaming 5 , MSI Z370 Pro carbon , MSI z370 M5

Entry (sub 150W probably / 120mm fan cooler level, should be $120 or less if VRM is the only concern) = Asrock Z370 Killer SLI (push pin heatsink , cut down features is another issue on top of regular Sinopowers) , MSI z370 SLI PLUS (uPi controller + Ubiq mosfets) , MSI Z370 Krait (uPi controller + Ubiq mosfets) , MSI Z370 Tomahawk (uPi controller + Ubiq mosfets ; ALC892)
Not suitable for really overclocking unless it's not an i7 (at best MCE/ multi-core turbo only) = Asus TUF Pro Gaming / z370 STRIX H, Gigabyte Z370 Ultra Gaming , Gigabyte Z370 Gaming 3 & K3, Gigabyte Z370 XP SLI, MSI Z370 Gaming Plus, etc
<4 phases , or partially Unheatsinked (don't buy) :Asus Z370-P / TUF Z370 Plus, MSI Z370-A Pro , MSI z370 PC Pro, Asrock Z370 Pro4 , Gigabyte Z370 HD3, Gigabyte Z370M D3H , etc

上面個表, 係for 8700k 5ghz

個表既原意都唔係話追5GHz咁Specific咁odd囉

個表左邊高中低階分類係指vrm power

個表係VRM表同追5GHz有必然關係咩
個表首先就唔係只為追5GHz咁簡單囉

Anyway有D野呢度無人提既係
1.個條友建議就算唔開蓋，都係MidRange起跳 供電呀大佬
2.如果無睇錯既話，sub-150W個批板有D係MCE enabled by default 痴左線

冇, 你抽到粒1.1v上到5ghz咪冇關係

唔超頻, 講經呀?
mce enable咪就係1.35v~1.4v

必然關係你明唔明解 點撚解一開口就係要上5GHz
依家係你想超5GHz而個表幫到你，唔係個表為左超5GHz而生...
講真，Thermals同VCore有得追，5GHz靠運你點追?

至於MCE，我想講既係，
你估第時有幾多On9仔買完塊「入門級」Z370，唔為意MCE by default搞到縮肛

呢兩日睇咗d ryzen 打機performance 的討論

最大爭議算係benchmark 1080p 時ryzen 表現大大不如intel

而ryzen 陣營會話買得1700-1800x都唔會玩1080p

事實係用1440,4k 測試cpu 根本就錯晒，gpu bottleneck 隱藏咗cpu性能問題

如果買ryzen打機係買未來，我好難唔質疑佢點解打1080p 會低frame咁多，今日打1440，4k 無事，唔代表聽日無


我唔係要反ryzen, 事實佢係all round, 抵食

但我十分唔認同有人話1440，4k 打機用ryzen 就無問題呢個講法


我一早講過啦，但 Fact 蓋過左個 True Let it go



見過有例子講：

1080下：
CPU A 60 fps
CPU B 80 fps
GPU 100fps

結果係B>A 20fps

4k下
CPU A 60fps
CPU B 80fps
GPU 50fps結果係CPU A B 都係出到相若結果50fps

雖則話practically 打4K無乜分別，但無改A不如B


萬一有隻game 行4K 又好cpu intensive

CPU A 30fps
CPU B 45fps
GPU cap 50fps

咁CPU A 的不足遲早浮面

又係果幾個負皮

前排冇上黎.而家其實咩事

Intel coffeelake.你可以話佢乜野改進都冇.純粹加兩粒核心

但係佢就係實際測試入面.係打機勁過Ryzen好多

呢個冇人否認到amd fans都唔需要話偏幫amd

我自己AMD Fans都唔會話幫AMD.起高階打機平台上

但intel方面都可以考慮返AMD Ryzen7 平台係平d既

其實各有各玩.各有優勢.

今次咪當行返一路以黎.AMD同Intel既重點

就係抵玩買AMD.有錢追求高性能就Intel

一路至今都係咁
